about_the_game:
USA Tour, Open World
– Implemented Multiple Open World Maps.

User can now navigate through the global earth map to select between Saudi Arabia and USA map.
– USA Map navigation.

Explore landscapes inspired by iconic North American landmarks, from the Grand Canyon to the Nevada Desert and Yellowstone, in both Rally Raid competitions and Free Roam mode, all throughout a 256 km2 map size.

Compete in the Rally events:
Sport Game Mode (20x Stages)
– USA Tour Qualifications (3x Stages)
– Yellowstone Rally (4x Stages)
– Nevada Desert Rally (4x Stages)
– Grand Canyon Rally (4x Stages)
– USA Tour (5x Stages)

Professional Game Mode (12x Stages)
– Yellowstone Rally (3x Stages)
– Nevada Desert Rally (3x Stages)
– Grand Canyon Rally (3x Stages)
– USA Tour (3x Stages)
detailed_description:
USA Tour, Open World
– Implemented Multiple Open World Maps.

User can now navigate through the global earth map to select between Saudi Arabia and USA map.
– USA Map navigation.

Explore landscapes inspired by iconic North American landmarks, from the Grand Canyon to the Nevada Desert and Yellowstone, in both Rally Raid competitions and Free Roam mode, all throughout a 256 km2 map size.

Compete in the Rally events:
Sport Game Mode (20x Stages)
– USA Tour Qualifications (3x Stages)
– Yellowstone Rally (4x Stages)
– Nevada Desert Rally (4x Stages)
– Grand Canyon Rally (4x Stages)
– USA Tour (5x Stages)

Professional Game Mode (12x Stages)
– Yellowstone Rally (3x Stages)
– Nevada Desert Rally (3x Stages)
– Grand Canyon Rally (3x Stages)
– USA Tour (3x Stages)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4GB) / Radeon RX 570 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790k / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 (8GB) / Radeon RX5700 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard

short_description: Explore a massive new open world with new landscapes inspired by iconic North American landmarks, from the Grand Canyon to the Nevada Desert and Yellowstone, in both Rally Raid competitions and Free Roam mode.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
